fields.bodyText: • Bebo to launch revamped site this month >> NMA • Commercial Twitter spamming tool hits the market >> Zero Day • Digital pirates winning battle with studios >> NYTimes • With Latitude, Google fires another shot at mobile operators >> GigaOM • Digital-music revenues jumped in 2008 >> Economist • Blinkx adds web TV to video search >> Guardian • Steve Boxer talks to Atari founder, Nolan Bushnell >> Guardian • Google starts the hard work of getting white spaces up and running >> mocoNews • Please stop it with the APIs >> Econsultancy • TED on porn, malaria and robots >> BBC • Where are Twitter and Facebook's geolocation features? >> Mashable • A brief history of Twitter >> GigaOM Via delicious
